alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorm will impact portions of Clay, southern York, southeastern Hamilton and Fillmore Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms near Shickley, or 30 miles south of York, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...These thunderstorms could bring down some stronger winds from aloft resulting in wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and perhaps even close to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... York, Geneva, Sutton, Henderson, Clay Center, Exeter, Fairmont, Edgar, Hampton, McCool Junction, Fairfield, Shickley, Bradshaw, Waco, Grafton, Deweese, Ong, Saronville, Stockham and Lushton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 336 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
